titles.title: Ensuring VetSuccess On Campus Act of 2023
Ensuring VetSuccess On Campus Act of 2023
A bill to expand the VetSuccess on Campus program of the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Ensuring VetSuccess On Campus Act of 2023
This bill requires the Department of Veterans Affairs to ensure that the VetSuccess on Campus (VSOC) program is located in every state. The program supports veterans, servicemembers, and qualified dependents who are transitioning from military service to college life.
The VA must ensure that at least one VSOC counselor is located in each state.
